headline: Securityholders approve changes to Invesco Canada funds
summary: Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco") today announced that securityholders of Invesco FTSE RAFI Canadian Index ETF, Invesco FTSE RAFI U.S. Index ETF, Invesco FTSE RAFI U.S. Index ETF II and Invesco FTSE RAFI Canadian Index ETF Class (each a "Fund" and collectively, the "Funds") have approved changes to each of the Funds' investment objectives, effective on or about March 24, 2025.

raw.headline: Securityholders approve changes to Invesco Canada funds
raw.summary: Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco") today announced that securityholders of Invesco FTSE RAFI Canadian Index ETF, Invesco FTSE RAFI U.S. Index ETF, Invesco FTSE RAFI U.S. Index ETF II and Invesco FTSE RAFI Canadian Index ETF Class (each a "Fund" and collectively, the "Funds") have approved changes to each of the Funds' investment objectives, effective on or about March 24, 2025.

headline: Invesco Advisers, Inc. Announces Termination of Managed Distribution Plans for Invesco High Income Trust II and Invesco Senior Income Trust
summary: Invesco Advisers, Inc., a subsidiary of Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), announced today that, effective immediately, the Board of Trustees ("Board") of each of Invesco High Income Trust II (NYSE: VLT) and Invesco Senior Income Trust (NYSE: VVR) (each, a "Fund" and collectively, the "Funds") terminated the Managed Distribution Plan for each Fund (individually, the "VLT Plan" and "VVR Plan" and collectively, the "Plans").

raw.headline: Invesco Advisers, Inc. Announces Termination of Managed Distribution Plans for Invesco High Income Trust II and Invesco Senior Income Trust

headline: Invesco American Franchise Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The fund outperformed its benchmark and peers for the final quarter and full year 2024, driven by positive stock selection.

headline: Invesco Health Care Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Stock selection in life science tools & services, pharmaceuticals and distributors detracted from relative performance, as did an overweight in health care facilities.

headline: Invesco Global Opportunities Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
